title: Attack Vessel Type 37C
wikitext:

'''Craft''': Sienar Fleet Systems Attack Vessel Type 37c
'''Type''': Attack Craft
'''Scale''': Capital
'''Length''': 300 m
'''Crew''': 300, '''skeleton '''105/+10
'''Passengers''': 200 (troops)
'''Cargo Capacity''': 2,000 metric tons
'''Consumables''': 1 year
'''Cost''': not available for sale
'''Hyperdrive Multiplier''': x2
'''Hyperdrive Backup''': x10
'''Nav Computer''': Yes
'''Maneuverability''': 2D
'''Space''': 6
'''Atmosphere''': --
'''Hull''': 5D
'''Shields''': 2D
'''Sensors''': *Passive 50/1D *Scan 70/2D *Search 90/3D *Focus 4/3D+2 '''Weapons''': *'''11 Turbolaser Batteries''' : Fire Arc: 3 front, 3 left, 3 right, 2 back
Fire Control: 2D
Space Range: 3-15/36/75
Atmosphere Range: 6-30/72/150
Damage: 5D *'''4 Proton Torpedo Launchers''' : Fire Arc: Front
Scale: Starfighter
Fire Control: 2D
Space Range: 1/3/7
Atmosphere Range: 30-100/300/700
Damage: 9D '''Starfighter Complement''': 4 fighters, 2 shuttles '''Capsule''': An attack craft developed one year prior to the battle of Yavin, this craft did not see wide spread use in the Imperial fleet, but it did sell well as a planetary defense ship. Many ships are used as customs ships, using the fighter bay to carry 4 skipray blastboats and no shuttles, and simply bringing freighters on board to board. '''Source''': [http://www.RPGGamer.org www.RPGGamer.org]
